titles.title: Haymanotä ʾabäw “Faith of the Fathers” / Mäṣḥafä ṭomar “Book of the Letter (from Heaven)”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Haymanotä ʾabäw “Faith of the Fathers” (fols. 2ra-133va) II) Mäṣḥafä ṭomar “Book of the Letter (from Heaven)” (fols. 133va-135rc) - Table of contents (fols. 135va-136r).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is badly damaged by water (with some loss of text on many fols.). The quires are misplaced. The leather cover is for the most part missing. Half of the back board is missing. Fol. 136 is mutilated.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (the front board is repaired, half of the back board is missing) covered with covered with brown tooled leather (for the most part is missing); textile inlays preserved on the inner side of the front board. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the brown leather turn-ins (at least 2 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle).

bnothers.bnother: Two rows of holes on the back folds of the quires.

squires.squire:
፩I (9; s.l.: 1, stub after 9/fols. 1r-9v) – ፪II (8/fols. 10r-17v) – ፫III (8/fols. 18r-25v) – ፬IV (8/fols. 26r-33v) – ፭V (8/fols. 34r-41v) – ፲፩VI (8/fols. 42r-49v) – ፯VII (8/fols. 50r-57v) – ፲፪VIII (8/fols. 58r-65v) – ፱IX (8/fols. 66r-73v) – ፲X (8/fols. 74r-81v) – ፮XI (8/fols. 82r-89v) – ፰XII (8/fols. 90r-97v) – ፲፫XIII (9; s.l.: 4, stub after 4/fols. 98r-106v) – ፲፬XIV (8/fols. 107r-114v) – ፲፭XV (8/fols. 115r-122v) – ፲፯XVI (8/fols. 123r-130v) – ፲፯XVII (6; s.l.: 1, no stub; 2, no stub/fols. 131r-136v).
The correct sequence of quires would be ፩I (9; s.l.: 1, stub after 9/fols. 1r-9v) – ፪II (8/fols. 10r-17v) – ፫III (8/fols. 18r-25v) – ፬IV (8/fols. 26r-33v) – ፭V (8/fols. 34r-41v) – ፮XI (8/fols. 82r-89v) – ፯VII (8/fols. 50r-57v) – ፰XII (8/fols. 90r-97v) – ፱IX (8/fols. 66r-73v) – ፲X (8/fols. 74r-81v) – ፲፩VI (8/fols. 42r-49v) – ፲፪VIII (8/fols. 58r-65v) – ፲፫XIII (9; s.l.: 4, stub after 4/fols. 98r-106v) – ፲፬XIV (8/fols. 107r-114v) – ፲፭XV (8/fols. 115r-122v) – ፲፯XVI (8/fols. 123r-130v) – (6; s.l.: 1, no stub; 2, no stub/fols. 131r-136v).

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; a few lines on the incipit page, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of each subsection of the text; elements of punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; some words like kǝfl (e.g., fols. 9ra, 13rb, 24ra), fǝkkare (e.g., fols. 121rb, 121va, 122ra), rabǝʿ (e.g., fols.122vc, 124rb, 126va), yǝbe (e.g., fols. 130ra, 130va), tǝʿǝzaz (e.g., fols. 132vc, 133ra).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ክ፡/ክፍ፡ for ክፍል፡ (e.g., fols. 39rb, 39vb, 64rb) ራብ፡ for ራብዕ፡ (fol. 122ra)

extras.extra: - Crude writing and drawing exercises: fols. 1r, 2r, 36r, 16r, 17r, 26r, 27r, 44r, 109v, 136v. - Corrections: fols. 4rc, 5ra, c, 6va, 8vb, 7rb, 11ra, b, 41rb, 76vb, 79rb, 85ra, 94va, 108rc, 111vb, 114rb, 114vb, 115va, 125rc. - Immediate correction through dashes above and below the word: fols. 5va, 69rb, 71rc, 72rb, 73vb, 93va, 94va. - Immediate correction through lines above and below the word: fols. 5vc, 40rc, 41rb, 76vb, 77vc. - Interlinear corrections: fols. 42v, 54v, 55r, 56v, 57r, 57v, 66v, 67r, 67v, 68r, 68v, 69r, 69v, 70v, 72r, 72v, 73r, 73v, 74r, 75v, 76r, 76v, 77r, 77v, 78r, 78v, 79v, 80r, 80v, 81r, 81v, 82v, 91r, 93v, 94r, 95v, 97r, 97v, 106vc. - Erasures: fols. 13ra, 27rc, 38r, 54ra, 92vb, 97vc. - Illegible marginal notes: fols. 68v, 70v, 71r, 71v, 72r, 74r. - Tämälläs sign indicating the place where the omissions, written in the margins, belong: fols. 42rb l.23, 42rc l.9, 42vb l.32, 54rb l.14, 55rb l.5, 55rb l.19, 55va l.6, 55vb l.10, 55vc l.16, 67rb l.24, 67rb l.35, 67vc l.21, 68va l.16, 69rc l.15, 69vb l.8, 70vc l.16, 70vc l.31, 71rc l.2, 73va l.1, 74rb l.19, 75va l.8, 78vb l.35, 79va l.20, 81rb l.31, 92vb l.19, 93ra l.35, 94rc l.18, 94rc l.23, 94va l.14, 95rb l.14, 96rb l.6, 96rc l.20, 96rc l.24, 97vc l.20.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Quire marks are written twice, one on bottom margin by black ink and one on the top margin by red pen, in fols. 2r, 10r, 18r, 26r, 34r, 42r, 50r, 58r, 66r, 74r, 82r, 90r, 98r, 107r, 115r, 123r, 131r.
